conversations.content: When is my next Yoga Class? Tell me in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'.

<function_thought>
To find out when Emma Johnson's next Yoga class is, I need to first determine the current date. This is necessary to accurately query for upcoming Yoga events in her calendar. I will execute the function to get the current day in ISO format.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_current_day()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
Now that I have the current date, which is 2024-05-15, I can search for upcoming Yoga classes in the calendar. I will look for events with "Yoga" in their title or description that occur on or after today's date.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[search_calendar_events(query="Yoga", date=None)]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
